title: La Commenda
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a full vegan menu upon request (preferably call one day ahead). Dishes include Jerusalem artichoke cream and stuffed bell peppers as antipasto, black rice risotto with saffron, gnocchi with soy cream, spicy tagliatelle with oil, garlic and dried tomatoes as pasta dish, braised seitan with red cabbage as main dish, and a selection of sorbets and fruit creams as dessert. The owner is more than willing to offer vegan food since he loves to experiment.
